text:
Despite The @WHO advising us the #AstraZeneca #vaccine is safe, we still suspend its use & are selectively copying & pasting the advice of others.
Damn it, those of us that are dying would like to live before we leave.
#Vaccines4Vulnerable #V4V
#COVID19 @V4VIreland #Cancer https://t.co/KzTL6rgscs
